articles.title: Alcohol consumption linked to increased heart disease risk in young women: Study - WION
articles.description: Young to middle-aged women who drink more than one alcoholic drink a day, on average, were more likely to develop coronary heart disease than people who drink less, according to new research presented at the American College of Cardiology's Annual Scientific …
